text: Partie de cartes is a 1895 French silent movie directed by Louis LumièrePartie d’écartéPartie d’écarté and stars Antoine Féraud, Antoine Lumière, and Félicien Trewey. ==Actors== *Antoine Féraud *Antoine Lumière as Man playing cards *Félicien Trewey as Man playing cards to the right *Alphonse Winckler as Man playing cards ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1895 movies Category:French silent movies
title: Partie de cartes
